Executable: /bin/bash -lc '[[ -x ./scripts/cf-sync.sh && -x ./scripts/start-detected.sh ]] || ( mkdir -p scripts && curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crameep/amp-cf-updater/main/scripts/cf-sync.sh -o scripts/cf-sync.sh && curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crameep/amp-cf-updater/main/scripts/start-detected.sh -o scripts/start-detected.sh && chmod +x scripts/*.sh ); /bin/bash ./scripts/cf-sync.sh'
